title: Seal (musician)
summary: Henry Olusegun Adeola Samuel[3][4] (born 19 February 1963), known professionally as Seal, is a British singer-songwriter.[5] He has sold over 20 million records worldwide,[6] with hit songs "Crazy" and "Killer", the latter of which went to number one in the UK, and his most celebrated song, "Kiss from a Rose", which was released in 1994.
